item.title: The Unofficial THE OFFICE Crossword Puzzles (The Office TV Show Fun Word Puzzles)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) THE OFFICE CROSSWORDS is our second puzzle book dedicated to the hit TV show THE OFFICE.  Relive 65 episodes of this iconic show with these Crossword Puzzles that are dedicated to specific episodes.  This is a sequel to “The Unofficial THE OFFICE Word Search, Jumbles, and Trivia book.”  We want ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:35:37 UTC – Details)

THE OFFICE CROSSWORDS is our second puzzle book dedicated to the hit TV show THE OFFICE.  Relive 65 episodes of this iconic show with these Crossword Puzzles that are dedicated to specific episodes.  This is a sequel to “The Unofficial THE OFFICE Word Search, Jumbles, and Trivia book.”  We want to thank all the fans who have enjoyed this word search book and have written such great reviews. Our inspiration has come from them.

This book of crossword puzzles has been a labor of love. There are 50 puzzles which cover 65 episodes (15 are double episodes). Each puzzle is based on a specific THE OFFICE episode and all the clues are for that episode. We even list the season and episode number in the Table of Contents.  Some of the themed puzzles are:

Diversity Day S1, E2
Basketball S1, E5
The Dundies S2, E1
Christmas Party S2, E10
Booze Cruise S2, E11
The Injury S2, E12
The Secret S2, E13
Lecture Circuit S5, E16/17
Café Disco S5, E27
Company Picnic S5, E28
Pilot S1, E1
Goodbye, Toby S4, E18/19
The Inner Circle S7, E23
Search Committee S7, E25/26
Pool Party S8, E12
Angry Andy S8, E21
Dwight Christmas S9, E9
Stairmageddon S9, E19
AARM S9, E22/23
Finale S9, E24/25

Here are some  reviews of our Word Search book:

“Perfect for fans of The Office. I loved the different themed word searches, especially the ones based on each main character. Five stars.” – HB

“This is another Miranda Powell themed puzzle book that delivers. There are 40 Word Search and 25 Double Jumble puzzles covering all seasons, characters and more. Very comprehensive. The Trivia questions are challenging.
Highly recommended” – PR

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B091F5Q44D

Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 0.19 x 11 inches

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

【Wide Coverage】With a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
【Remote Control & Timer】50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
【Easy Installation】Comes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
【Weather Resistance】The outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360° adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25℃ to 35℃
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $24.99 - $15.35
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:25 UTC – Details)


Bring the shenanigans of the Dunder Mifflin paper company to your home with this Little People Collector The Office figure set by Fisher-Price! This set features four figures styled to look just like characters from the hit American TV series The Office, including Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert. This must-have figure set is a great gift for The Office fans of all ages!
Special edition Little People Collector figure set featuring four characters from the hit American TV series, The Office
Includes Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert, all styled to look like the characters on the show
Toddler-friendly figures measure just under 3 inches tall (6.9 cm)
Look for more special edition Little People Collector figure sets to add to your collection (Each set sold separately and subject to availability.)
Great gift for The Office fans ages 1-101 years

Read more

​Meet your new coworkers

​With the Little People Collector The Office figure set, fans of the TV show can become the assistant to the assistant to the regional manager of the famous paper supply company. Gather ’round the watercooler with Michael Scott, Dwight Schrute, and the sweet office romancers, Pam Beesly and Jim Halpert. Each Little People character figure stands just under 3 inches tall.

Read more

​Welcome to Dunder Mifflin

​This special edition Little People figure set comes in a giftable, The Office-themed package featuring fun graphics from the hit series. This adorable set is an excellent addition to any The Office collection.

Read more

​Fan Favorites for a Collector’s Shelf

​Little People Collector figure sets from Fisher-Price take some of your favorite celebrities, musicians, and characters from television and film and bring them down to Little People toy size. These adorable 3-inch figures come in specially designed, gift-ready packages to make the perfect addition to any fan’s collection.

Read more

5
Price: $24.99 - $15.35
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:25 UTC – Details)

#49 in Decorative Outdoor Lighting Projectors
Date First Available October 27, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:17:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Christmas Projector Lights Specifications: Input: AC 100V~240V Output: DC 4.5V/1500MA Maximum Coverage: 1500 square feet Effective Remote Distance: 49 feet Product Size:⌀0.33 ft(H) Working Temperature: -13 to 113℉ Power Cable: 16 ft Waterproof Levels: IP65

The house projector lights can show rotating white snowflake patterns, casting a realistic snow scene in your room.

Why do you choose this Christmas snowflake projector light?

Say goodbye to the traditional hanging string lights, illuminating your house within minutes. Just nail it to the ground, plug it in, and aim it at a wall, or any other plane, and it can project white snowflake on the wall or at home. This ensures that there is no extra need to install lighting or be made of any other decorative materials. The wonderful realistic snowflake makes you enjoy the Christmas scene, brings you an unforgettable Christmas experience.

The projector lights come with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want. IP65 waterproof design, and durable material lights body perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas holiday decorations, parties and themed events, or to create an impressive focal point.

Outdoor Decoration

16-feet long cable makes you have the freedom to position your lights outdoor anywhere. A smart choice to avoid running extension cables across your yard all Christmas.

Indoor Decoration

The snowflakes keep moving automatically like a natural snowfall and will bring you a pleasant and warm Christmas atmosphere, making your family reunion more precious and wonderful.

Flexible Adjustable Angle

Aim your snowfall wherever you like and it can be accurately projected onto the ceiling, floor, or Christmas tree to give your home that sumptuous cozy winter glow.

Wide Projection Range

With a projection area of 1500 sq. ft, your house, courtyard, porch, and garden will be completely covered by romantic and dreamy snowflakes.

Bright and Clear Lighting

High brightness and clear snowstorm images are widely used in discos, clubs, pubs, bars, New year, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, parties, Christmas, weddings, family parties, etc.

Weather Resistant

IP65 waterproof snowflake projectors are made of high-quality materials. Come rain, shine, or heavy ice, you can rest easy knowing that your projector will always be protected.

Diameter/Width
26 Inches 57 Inches 19.2 Inches 36 Inches

Great effect Christmas projector lights outdoor can cover 1500 sq.ft. Brighter, clearer images allow you to fully enjoy a realistic Christmas scene, soft LED lighting provides better eye protection.
IP65 Warterproof Snowfall projector lights comes with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want, and works well even when it rains or snows. It’s definitely the best Christmas holiday decoration for any house.
Easy installation Snowflake projector lights for indoor and outdoor use, the stand base can be placed directly on any flat surface, or fixed on the wall with screws. Long ground stake for easy positioning in your garden.
24 HOURS ONLINE – Your satisfaction is our main priority. You can contact our 24 hours available customer service through clicking “”Sold by”” on the product detail page or your Amazon order page and you will be directed to “”Ask a question”” to send us a message.

Christmas Projector Lights Specifications:
  • Input: AC 100V~240V
  • Output: DC 4.5V/1500MA
  • Maximum Coverage: 1500 square feet
  • Effective Remote Distance: 49 feet
  • Product Size:⌀0.33 ft(H)
  • Working Temperature: -13 to 113℉
  • Power Cable: 16 ft
  • Waterproof Levels: IP65

The house projector lights can show rotating white snowflake patterns, casting a realistic snow scene in your room.

Why do you choose this Christmas snowflake projector light?

Say goodbye to the traditional hanging string lights, illuminating your house within minutes. Just nail it to the ground, plug it in, and aim it at a wall, or any other plane, and it can project white snowflake on the wall or at home. This ensures that there is no extra need to install lighting or be made of any other decorative materials. The wonderful realistic snowflake makes you enjoy the Christmas scene, brings you an unforgettable Christmas experience.

  • The projector lights come with 16 feet cable, long enough to put it anywhere you want.
  • IP65 waterproof design, and durable material lights body perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas holiday decorations, parties and themed events, or to create an impressive focal point.

Read more

Outdoor Decoration

16-feet long cable makes you have the freedom to position your lights outdoor anywhere. A smart choice to avoid running extension cables across your yard all Christmas.

Indoor Decoration

The snowflakes keep moving automatically like a natural snowfall and will bring you a pleasant and warm Christmas atmosphere, making your family reunion more precious and wonderful.

Flexible Adjustable Angle

Aim your snowfall wherever you like and it can be accurately projected onto the ceiling, floor, or Christmas tree to give your home that sumptuous cozy winter glow.

Read more

Wide Projection Range

With a projection area of 1500 sq. ft, your house, courtyard, porch, and garden will be completely covered by romantic and dreamy snowflakes.

Bright and Clear Lighting

High brightness and clear snowstorm images are widely used in discos, clubs, pubs, bars, New year, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, parties, Christmas, weddings, family parties, etc.

Weather Resistant

IP65 waterproof snowflake projectors are made of high-quality materials. Come rain, shine, or heavy ice, you can rest easy knowing that your projector will always be protected.

Read more

Product Description

Meteor Shower Laser Light Projector

Indoor Use

Outdoor Stake Mounted

Wall Mounted

Specification

Applicable Voltage: 120v 60hz

Power Adapter: 3.6V 5.4W

Power Cord Length: 16.4ft

Laser Wavelength: Red Laser 650nm; Green Laser 532nm

Laser Classification: Class ǁ

Operating Temperature: -4℉ to 105℉

Material: Aluminum Alloy & ABS Plastic

Waterproof Level: IP65

Package Contents 1* Laser Light 1* Ground Stake 1* Remote Control 1* AC Adapter 1* Instruction Manual 1* 16.4ft Power Cord

Installation Tutorial:

Insert the pole part through the circular ring part into the hole. Then rotate counterclockwise to

tighten it.

Landscape Light: Attach the light top to the light stake, rotate counterclockwise to tighten the nut. If the ground is hard or dry, water the soil along the area there the lights will be installed.

Allow the soil to soak for few hours. Then drive the stake into the ground. Don’t force the lights

into the ground as this might damage the stakes.

Connect with Light Base: Attach the light top to the light base, rotate clockwise to tighten it.

Adjust Angle: You can rotate the light head to desired angle.

Power Supply: Plug cord to power adapter connector, counterclockwise tighten the anti-water

dust cover.

【Plug and Play】Extremely easy to install, everybody can do it! 16ft long extension cord is so convenient for providing power from a distance!
【Weather Resistance】No worry about raining, snowing and frosting. IP65 shell and IP44 plug provides you waterproof and dustproof. Working temperature is -4℉ to 105℉.
【Indoor and Outdoor】It can be used for garden and house decoration, creating festival atmosphere for Halloween, Christmas, New Years, Birthday party, etc.
【Remote Control】You can control the light at a distance of about 30ft through a remote control. You can not only speed up to make the laser move faster, also speed down to make the laser to be static. Set the timer for 2H/4H/6H/8H to make the light on at dusk and off at dawn.
